MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Broombank Terrace and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.19pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:04PM on Thursday 25 March 2021.
